Control Name: 1.7.8 Costs are optimized by using the App Service Premium (v3) plan over the Premium (Pv2) plan.
Control Statement: The App Service Premium (v3) Plan has a 20% discount versus comparable Pv2 configurations. Reserved Instance commitment (1Y, 3Y, Dev/Test) discounts are available for App Services running in the Premium v3 plan. The Premium v3 pricing tier provides faster processors, SSD storage, and quadruple the memory-to-core ratio of the existing pricing tiers (double the Premium v2 tier). With the performance advantage, you can save money by running your apps on fewer instances.
